CustomField.formula: "&id=" + Id + "&templateid=a0nt0000000s8jP" + "&defaultpdf=1" + "&queryid=[Education]a0mt00000000sKw,[Disclaimer]a0mt00000001R1N?pv1=" + Record_Type_Name__c + ",[REG]a0mt00000000sKq,[REGACT]a0mt0000000J0uD,[Bond]a0mt00000000sKv,[Owner]a0mt00000000sKr,[Manager]a0mt00000000sKt, [Reglocation]a0mt00000000sKx,[FUQues]a0mt00000000sKu,[Ques]a0mt00000000sKs,[Attach]a0mt00000000sKy,[Trade]a0mt0000000J0uI,[Document]a0mt00000000sKp" + IF(Status_of_Payment__c="Paid / No Balance Due","&CongaEmailTemplateId=a0lt0000000XBan","&CongaEmailTemplateId=a0lt0000000XBas") + "&EmailAdditionalTo=" + Applicant_s_Email__c + "&EmailFromID=0D2d0000000Gr2j" + "&qmode=SendEmail" + "&SC0=1" + "&SC1=Attachments" + "&OFN=Affidavit PDF for " + License_Registration_Number__c
CustomField.label: Send PW Registration Doc
